vault.title: Your Heritage Vault
vault.subtitle: Secure repository for your valuable assets and important documents
vault.description: Organize your life's accomplishments and valuable possessions so your family can easily locate and manage everything you have built.
vault.empty: Your vault awaits your first entry. We recommend beginning with your most significant asset.

form.name: Asset Name
form.namePlaceholder: Please enter a descriptive name for this asset
form.nameHelper: Use a name your family will easily recognize
form.selectType: Please select the type of asset
form.descriptionPlaceholder: Please provide important details about this asset
form.descriptionHelper: Include any information that would help your family understand or locate this asset
form.valueHelper: This helps your family understand the asset's significance
form.locationHelper: Be specific enough for your family to locate it
form.accountPlaceholder: Enter account number (will be securely encrypted)
form.accountHelper: This information will be encrypted and only accessible to designated individuals
form.institutionPlaceholder: Name of bank, company, or organization
form.beneficiariesHelper: List the individuals or organizations you wish to receive this asset
form.notesPlaceholder: Any additional information your loved ones should know
form.notesHelper: Include special instructions, sentimental value, or care instructions
form.attachmentsDescription: Upload relevant documents such as deeds, policies, statements, or certificates
form.tagsPlaceholder: Add tags to help categorize this asset
form.liensDescription: Any mortgages, loans, or debts against this asset

sharing.title: Family Access to This Asset
sharing.description: Control which family members can view and manage this asset information
sharing.noAccess: This asset information is currently private

accessLevels.viewOnly: View Only - Can see basic asset information
accessLevels.limited: Limited Access - Can view details and add notes
accessLevels.full: Full Access - Can view and modify all information
accessLevels.inherit: Inheritance Rights - Designated to receive this asset

notifications.assetAdded: Asset has been successfully added to your vault
notifications.assetDeleted: Asset has been removed from your vault
notifications.documentUploaded: Supporting document has been uploaded successfully
notifications.reminderSet: Review reminder has been set for {{date}}
notifications.documentLinked: Document has been linked to this asset

errors.loadingAssets: We encountered an issue loading your assets. Please refresh the page and try again.
errors.savingAsset: We were unable to save the asset information. Please verify your details and try again.
errors.deletingAsset: We could not remove this asset. Please try again in a moment.
errors.uploadingDocument: The document upload was unsuccessful. Please check the file format and try again.
errors.invalidValue: Please enter a valid monetary amount
errors.requiredField: This information is required to proceed
errors.assetNotFound: The requested asset could not be located
errors.accessDenied: You do not have permission to access this asset information
errors.duplicateName: An asset with this name already exists in your vault
errors.connectionError: Connection issue detected. Please check your internet connection and try again.
errors.serverError: We are experiencing technical difficulties. Please try again shortly.

validation.nameRequired: Please provide a name for this asset
validation.typeRequired: Please select the type of asset
validation.valueInvalid: Please enter a valid monetary value
validation.accountNumberInvalid: Please enter a valid account number
validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
